name: FightBots
description:
FightBots is a third-person arena game in which you'll play a professional robot athlete in this sport and have to defeat your opponents using a club. Escape your opponents with evasive somersaults, attack them with up to 3-hit combos and aerial slashes. You'll be able to choose between different skins, buy heavier weapons and support items during matches, as well as unlock others as you play in a fast and engaging gameplay.
You'll be able to play alone or with a friend against waves of other opposing bots to advance in the league and become champion.
